name: Proskynitis
description:
Proskynitis is a game inspired by FTL : Faster Than Light where contrary to it, Proskynitis have an exploration part which is a shooter top down view part. In Proskynitis you need to travel through multiple solar system. In each of them you have the possibility to land on different planets. On those planets you will fight enemies, but you will find a lot of resources. During your travel, events will be appears and your choice will be important. Some of those events will launch spaceship fight. You gonna be able to upgrade your ship, weapon... with resources. Your goal is to reach the last solar system and beat the final boss.

Credits :
